snippet: Mexican federal troops will replace local police in 32 municipalities, a top security official said on Wednesday, in a bid to contain drug gangs that have fueled a surge in violence and often operate in league with local police....

headline.print_headline: Mexico Sends Federal Troops Into Towns Plagued by Drug Gangs
headline.main: Mexico Sends Federal Troops Into Towns Plagued by Drug Gangs

lead_paragraph: Mexican federal troops will replace local police in 32 municipalities, a top security official said on Wednesday, in a bid to contain drug gangs that have fueled a surge in violence and often operate in league with local police.
